title: Proposes a constitutional amendment providing for initiative and referendum by eligible voters
summary: Reserves to the people of the state the power to propose laws and amendments to the constitution and to adopt or reject such proposals upon a referendum; provides petition procedures for placing such proposals on the ballot; limits use of referendums relating to laws for health and safety; requires referendums for expenditure of moneys to clearly state the source of such funds; prohibits governor from vetoing approved proposals.
actClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to the constitution, in relation to providing the electors with the power of initiative and referendum
